Uses of Class
squidpony.squidmath.Delaunay3D.Edge

Packages that use Delaunay3D.Edge 
Package Description
squidpony.squidmath
A very broad package containing random number generators, geometry tools, and some classes for combinatorics.

  • Uses of Delaunay3D.Edge in squidpony.squidmath

    Methods in squidpony.squidmath that return Delaunay3D.Edge 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Delaunay3D.Edge Delaunay3D.findNearestEdge​(CoordDouble point)
    Returns the edge from the triangle soup nearest to the specified point.
    Methods in squidpony.squidmath with parameters of type Delaunay3D.Edge 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Delaunay3D.Triangle Delaunay3D.findNeighbor​(Delaunay3D.Triangle triangle, Delaunay3D.Edge edge)
    Returns the neighbor triangle of the specified triangle sharing the same edge as specified.
    Delaunay3D.Triangle Delaunay3D.findOneTriangleSharing​(Delaunay3D.Edge edge)
    Returns one of the possible triangles sharing the specified edge.
    Delaunay3D.MultiCoord Delaunay3D.Triangle.getNonEdgeVertex​(Delaunay3D.Edge edge)
    Returns the vertex of this triangle that is not part of the given edge.
    boolean Delaunay3D.Triangle.isNeighbor​(Delaunay3D.Edge edge)
    Returns true if this triangle contains the given edge.
